l:dependency.name: metersphere-jenkins-plugin
l:dependency.l:description: Adds a post-build step to integrate Jenkins with MeterSphere

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Lang
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Codec
l:dependency.l:description: The Apache Commons Codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities.

l:dependency.name: fastjson
l:dependency.l:description: Fastjson is a JSON processor (JSON parser + JSON generator) written in Java
